headline: Electrical Engineer at China Civil Engineering Construction Corporation (CCECC)
about: I am Md. Nazmul Karim having 7+ year experience in diverse sector like Project Financing, Project Management, Installation, Design, Pricing etc. I obtained experience on Project Due Diligence & Technical Evaluation under my working period of 2 year in Bangladesh Infrastructure Finance Fund Limited (under Ministry of Finance, GoB). In this period my major responsibilities were conduct Monitoring, Reporting, Technical Feasibility, Due Diligence and Appraisal of the projects. Cross-checking specifications requirements to fix the project CAPEX. Coordination with National and International Agencies like SREDA, JICA. My achievement in BIFFL was to complete project installation & commissioning work of the Head Office of BIFFL which was registered for USGBC LEED Platinum Certification. I also maximized my technical skill on Design, Pricing & Project Management under my working period in Crossworld Power Limited. Here my major responsibilities were to Prepare Design, Pricing, Documentation, Schedule & Supervision of Installation & Commissioning of the Assigned Projects like Substation, Generator, BBT etc. Monitor Compliance to Applicable codes, Practices, QA/QC policies, Performance Standard and Specifications. Cooperate and Communicate effectively with Clients, Project Manager & other Project Participants to provide assistance & technical support. In these 3 years period, achievements under my belt are Supervision of 11/0.415 kV 1000 KVA Sub Station, 1000 kVA Diesel Generator with ATS Panel & BBT Design & Installation of Center for Environmental and Geographic Information Services (CEGIS) Tower registered for USGBC LEED Gold Certification. Supervision of 11/0.415 kV 2500 KVA Sub Station, 2x650 kVA Diesel Generator with ATS & Auto Synchronization Panel, BBT & 25 kWp Solar System Installation of Bank Asia Tower. Currently I am working as Electrical Engineer in China Civil Engineering Construction Corporation (CCECC) under their project named "IsDB-BISEW Twin Tower". Here my responsibilities are to supervise the construction process of the Electrical System of the project, deal with Consultant & Client to meet their requirements & standards. I also have good understanding of Transformer, Substation Equipment, Earthing Work, Generator, Electrical Design-Drawings, Motor Controlling, Planning of Projects Erection, Commissioning, Operation & Maintenance.

experience.summary:
China Civil Engineering Construction Corporation (CCECC), formerly the Foreign Aid Bureau of the Ministry of Railways, was established in 1979 under the approval of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China and was incorporated into China Railway Construction Corporation (CRCC) in 2003 for strategic regrouping under the approval of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission. As one of the pioneering Chinese companies entering the international market, CCECC is now developed into a large-scale state-owned enterprise with Chinese National Super Grade Qualification for railway project engineering, and has been listed among the world’s top 225 International contractors for many years in a row. CCECC has established resident offices or project management headquarters in 89 countries and regions by the end of 2016, spreading across Asia, Europe, Africa, America and Oceania with its business covering project contracting, civil engineering design & consultancy, industrial park construction, development and operation, real estate development and property management, investment, railway operation, industrial mining, import & export, hotel management and travel services etc. My major responsibilities in this role are Prepare Working Drawing, Documentation, Schedule & Supervision of Installation & Commissioning of Electrification System of IsDB Twin Tower Project. Monitor Compliance to Applicable codes, Practices, QA/QC policies, Performance Standard and Specifications. Coordinate and Communicate effectively with Client, Consultant, Project Manager & other Project Participants to provide assistance & technical support.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
HR DESK desired to provide support to the Job seekers, students, future leaders through Job circular, career tips, motivational posts, soft skills and job related training.
IEEE is the world's largest technical professional organization dedicated to advancing technological.

S. A Group of Industries started their journey in 1988 serving Bangladesh with the best quality consumer goods. First, the company invested in edible oil refining sector. Maintaining superior standards in all its products, the group won the hearts and minds of Bangladeshi customers within a short span of time by marketing products of lasting value. Currently, S. A Group of Industries has investments in 17 units with an annual turnover of 25 billion taka and employs over 2500 people. My major responsibilities in this role are oversees building and grounds maintenance. Operates and maintains custodial functions. Ensures security and emergency preparedness procedures are implemented properly. Ensures that the facility is clean and maintained according to company policy and procedures. Handles general accounting tasks, such as accounts payable, payroll, petty cash, and budgeting. Oversees and supervises the quality of work for other employees to ensure that all tasks are performed correctly, efficiently, and effectively. Manages and reviews service contracts. Conducts and documents regular facilities inspections. Checks completed work by vendors and contractors. Recommends maintenance, mechanical, electrical, and facility design modifications. Communicates workplace safety precautions to employees. Forecasts, allocates, and supervises the financial and physical resources of the facility management.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

Providers of state of the art diesel generator, Substation, and Power solution with excellent service and maintenance support. Countrywide service network with comprehensive range of quality spare parts. We have been partnering with and ensuring power for a broad and diverse customer base in Bangladesh since 1982. Over 5,000 small to large projects beat with a Cross-world heart across the country today. My responsibilities are to prepare Design, Pricing, Documentation, Schedule & Supervision of Installation & Commissioning of the Assigned Projects like Substation, Generator, BBT etc. Monitor Compliance to Applicable codes, Practices, QA/QC policies, Performance Standard and Specifications. Cooperate and Communicate effectively with Clients, Project Manager & other Project Participants to provide assistance & technical support.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

My core responsibilities in this position are to conduct Technical Feasibility, Due Diligence and Appraisal of the projects. Cross-checking specifications requirements to fix the project CAPEX. Monitoring project progress and reporting any discrepancy found from the original project plan. Coordination with International Agencies like JICA, ADB, World Bank KWF, AFD, FMO.

Bangladesh Infrastructure Finance Fund Limited (BIFFL) is a Government-owned Non-Banking Financial Institution, operating since 2011. It is established by a resolution of the Cabinet of the Government of Bangladesh and owned by the Ministry of Finance. BIFFL is the largest NBFI operating in the country in terms of capital base with BDT 19.40 billion paid up.BIFFL has a strong mandate to invest in the large infrastructure projects of Bangladesh, including power & energy, ports, connectivity, tourism and economic zones. It also wants to ensure a greener Bangladesh by investing in sustainable development projects with emphasis on renewable energy, energy efficiency and eco-friendly projects. BIFFL is working relentlessly to supplement government’s vision of achieving middle income status of the country by 2021.My am assign as Project Supervisor for BIFFL Corporate Office Project registered for USGBC LEED Certification. My responsibilities are to ensure work progress of the assign project as per work schedule. Ensure Civil, Electrical & Interior Design work as per drawing.

recommendations.name: MD IQBAL KABIR (Rimon)
recommendations.summary:
“I am writing to highly recommend Md. Nazmul Karim Saimon as an accomplished Electrical Engineer with 6+ years of experience in the field, I have had the pleasure of working closely with him and have consistently been impressed by their exceptional skills, dedication, and professionalism. During his time at CCECC, He has demonstrated a remarkable ability for identifying issues, developing innovative solutions, and implementing them effectively.
One of his greatest strengths is his keen analytical mind and problem-solving abilities. His contributions were invaluable, and he consistently delivered results that exceeded expectations. Furthermore, he is a collaborative team player who excels in communication and interpersonal skills. He has a proven track record of working effectively with cross-functional teams, communicating complex technical concepts in a clear and concise manner, and fostering a positive working environment. Beyond his technical expertise, he possesses outstanding leadership qualities and a strong work ethic. He is proactive, reliable, and consistently demonstrate a commitment to excellence in all aspects of his work. Their passion for their field is evident in everything they do, and I have no doubt that they will continue to excel in their future endeavors.
In conclusion, I wholeheartedly endorse him for his successful career. He is a highly skilled and dedicated professional who would be a valuable asset to any organization.”

recommendations.name: Johirul Islam Raju
recommendations.summary: “I wholeheartedly endorse Mr. Nazmul Karim Saimon as an exemplary Electrical engineer. His proficiency, unwavering commitment, and collaborative approach set him apart as an outstanding professional. Nazmul consistently produces work of the highest quality, making him an invaluable asset to any team.”
